name: Vandalizer
description:
Vandalizer 

is a game about painting on trains ,and not getting caught by railroad workers and various alarm systems. 

Bomb whole traffic with your graffiti pieces ,and become a whole city graffiti writer

Controls :
  • WASD - movement
  • Left Shift - sprint
  • Left Mouse Button - paint/use/open doors
  • ESC - to exit
Features:
  • For now done two types of enemies 
  • One alarm type
  • 2D lighting
  • Three depo(levels)
